summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2015 FORD F-150. WHILE DRIVING VARIOUS SPEEDS, THE STEERING FAILED. THE CONTACT PULLED OVER TO GAIN CONTROL OF THE VEHICLE. THERE WERE NO WARNING INDICATORS ILLUMINATED. BOB GILLINGHAM FORD (8383 BROOKPARK RD, PARMA, OH 44129, (216) 398-1300) DIAGNOSED THE VEHICLE, BUT WAS UNABLE TO FIND A FAILURE. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 100,000.
